subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: A second United States Open title was in Jim Furyk’s grasp Sunday as he stood on the No. 17 tee, gripping his driver. Then, suddenly, it was out of reach.
snippet: A second United States Open title was in Jim Furyk’s grasp Sunday as he stood on the No. 17 tee, gripping his driver. Then, suddenly, it was out of reach.
